County Clare is lighting up today with solid surf at 8 ft @ 13s W and fresh 15 mph W winds. Crab Island and Doolin Point are prime spots, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions improve with swell rising to 9 ft @ 11s W and light 6 mph WNW winds, making it a great day for a session. The day after, expect 6 ft @ 12s WNW but with fresh 22 mph SE winds, likely making it blown out. Best: tomorrow.
